inputs.remark:
Ordered list: Add electroacoustic analysis and REM.
Recommended tests: Add MRI/CT, ABR, OAE, central auditory processing tests.
Visits: V2 is missing. The generated “V2” is actually V3 (1‑month follow‑up). V3 still lacks electroacoustic analysis, REM, and directional microphone verification. V4 should represent the expected outcome.
Follow‑up plan: Add remote microphone verification.

logic_summary: Added Electroacoustic analysis, REM, MRI/CT, ABR, OAE, and central auditory processing tests to ordered_list.

Reconstructed expected_interpretations_by_visit to include missing V2 (Initial Fitting), rename old V2 to V3 (Follow-up) with added verification tests (Electroacoustic, REM, Directional Mic), and add V4 (BiCROS Outcome).
Updated follow_up_plan objective to include remote microphone verification.

value.rationale_short: To verify hearing aid performance against specifications.
To verify hearing aid gain matches prescriptive targets.
To rule out retrocochlear pathology or lesions along the auditory pathway.
To assess neural integrity of the auditory pathway.
To assess cochlear outer hair cell function.

value.collective_interpretation: Results reveal bilateral symmetrical moderately severe sensorineural hearing loss with a flat configuration. Despite symmetric thresholds, word recognition scores are asymmetric (poorer in the right ear). Middle ear function is normal, but acoustic reflexes are absent bilaterally.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: Bilateral symmetrical moderately severe sensorineural hearing loss (~60-70 dB HL).

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: SRTs agree with PTAs (R 75 dB, L 65 dB). WRS is asymmetric: Right 50%, Left 66% at 85 dB HL.

tests.name: Tympanometry
tests.result_summary: Type A bilaterally; normal middle ear pressure and compliance.

value.collective_interpretation: Initial fitting of RIC hearing aids with custom c-shells. Verified using Real Ear Measures (REM) to NAL-NL2 targets. Tinnitus program enabled.

tests.name: Real Ear Measures (REM)
tests.result_summary: Real-ear insertion gain (REIG) within 5 dB of prescribed targets at 50, 65, and 80 dB SPL.

value.collective_interpretation: Patient returns (1-month follow-up) reporting distortion in the right ear. Electroacoustic analysis confirms aids are functioning correctly. Aided testing confirms binaural interference.

tests.name: Electroacoustic analysis
tests.result_summary: Hearing aids meet manufacturer specifications. Directional microphone functioning as expected.

tests.name: Speech-in-noise / Aided Word Recognition
tests.result_summary: Left monaural aided: 66%; Right monaural aided: 40%; Bilateral aided: 50%. Demonstrates binaural interference.

value.collective_interpretation: Fitting of BiCROS system (Transmitter Right, Receiver Left). Verified via Test Box and REM. Patient reports improved listening effort and less distortion.

tests.name: Test Box Verification
tests.result_summary: Left receiver matched targets; transmitter verified to transmit signals.

tests.name: Real Ear Measures (REM)
tests.result_summary: Left receiver matched NAL-NL2 targets; transmitter activation eliminated the head shadow effect.

patch_ops.value: Fit and verify the BiCROS system, verify remote microphone, and monitor patient satisfaction.
